page_not_found: Sorry, this page does not exist...

auth.header_signin: Log in with username and password
auth.message_forgotten_password: Enter your e-mail address below and we will send you an e-mail to reset your password.

network-errors.unknown: Something went wrong while executing your request, please try again later.
network-errors.credentials: You are not authorized to perform this action.
network-errors.forbidden: You are not allowed to perform this action.
network-errors.not-found: The server was unable to find the information you requested.
network-errors.server-offline: The server is offline, the system is temporarily unavailable.
network-errors.server-timeout: The server took too long to respond, please try again. If this keeps happening, please contact the administrator
network-errors.server-cors: There seems to have been a CORS issue with the server. If this keeps happening, please contact the administrator
network-errors.bad-request: Incomplete request sent, please check it and try again.
network-errors.payload-too-large: The file is too large to be uploaded.
